title: Ranked down??
body:
Log on, have chat issues, resolve those, now I don't have the option to do ranked?

Looked through the service status' and the such to find nothing on it being disabled. working for anyone else?

replies.body: Ranked is disabled between 04:00-08:00 due to apparent lack of numbers for queues. To be honest I agree with this in certain divisions because I've had and seen queues of over an hour during peak times.
